member.name: T:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAContainerComboBox
member.summary: A combo box that can host other controls inside itself and shown them by pressing the dropdown button. This control already supports three different themes. If you want to use this control, you might want to look into FADatePicker control which is a sample control using this functionality.

member.name: T:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager
member.summary: Manages various instances of controls. This manager class, manages the saved responses of all controls.

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.CreateMessageBox(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new with the specified unique name. If null is specified in the name parameter of the control, the instance is not managed by the Manager and will be disposed automatically after call to method.
member.param: The name of the message box

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.CreateMessageBox(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new with the specified unique name. If null is specified in the name parameter of the control, the instance is not managed by the Manager and will be disposed automatically after call to method. Set IsRightToLeft value to true, if the control is supposed to run a RTL messagebox, else set it to false, or use the overloaded method.
member.param: The name of the which should be unique.
Is the instance has RTL or LTR layout.

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.GetMessageBox(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the instance with the specified name.
member.param: The name of the message box to retrieve
member.returns: The message box with the specified name or null if the message box with that name does not exist

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.DeleteMessageBox(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the message box with the specified name
member.param: The name of the message box to delete

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.WriteSavedResponses(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Save message box values to an stream.

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.ReadSavedResponses(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads message box values from DrawTab stream. This method is not implemented yet.

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.ResetSavedResponse(System.String)
member.summary: Reset the saved response for the message box with the specified name.
member.param: The name of the message box whose response is to be reset.

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.ResetAllSavedResponses
member.summary: Resets the saved responses for all message boxes that are managed by the manager.

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.SetSavedResponse(FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBox,System.String)
member.summary: Set the saved response for the specified message box
member.param: The message box whose response is to be set
The response to save for the message box

member.name: M:FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBoxManager.GetSavedResponse(FarsiLibrary.Win.Controls.FAMessageBox)
member.summary: Gets the saved response for the specified message box
member.param: The message box whose saved response is to be retrieved
member.returns: The saved response if exists, null otherwise
